mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R , WORKBOARD.NUM AS NUM , WORKBOARD.ID AS ID , WORKBOARD.TITLE AS TITLE , WORKBOARD.COMPENSATE AS COMPENSATE , WORKBOARD.NEEDPEOPLE AS NEEDPEOPLE , WORKBOARD.PHONE AS PHONE , WORKBOARD.CONTENT AS CONTENT , WORKBOARD.REGDATE AS REGDATE , WORKBOARD.STATE AS STATE , WORKBOARD.REGPEOPLE AS REGPEOPLE , WORKBOARD.ADDR AS ADDR , WORKBOARD.STARTDATE AS STARTDATE , WORKBOARD.ENDDATE AS ENDDATE , WORKBOARD.EXPIRE AS EXPIRE , MEMBER.SEX AS SEX FROM WORKBOARD WORKBOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER MEMBER ON WORKBOARD.ID = MEMBER.ID WHERE EXPIRE = '1' ) WHERE R >= #{start} AND R <= #{end} ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,BIRTH)/12),'99') AS age , NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R , WORKBOARD.NUM AS NUM , WORKBOARD.ID AS ID , WORKBOARD.TITLE AS TITLE , WORKBOARD.COMPENSATE AS COMPENSATE , WORKBOARD.NEEDPEOPLE AS NEEDPEOPLE , WORKBOARD.PHONE AS PHONE , WORKBOARD.CONTENT AS CONTENT , WORKBOARD.REGDATE AS REGDATE , WORKBOARD.STATE AS STATE , WORKBOARD.REGPEOPLE AS REGPEOPLE , WORKBOARD.ADDR AS ADDR , WORKBOARD.STARTDATE AS STARTDATE , WORKBOARD.ENDDATE AS ENDDATE , WORKBOARD.EXPIRE AS EXPIRE , MEMBER.SEX AS SEX FROM WORKBOARD WORKBOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER MEMBER ON WORKBOARD.ID = MEMBER.ID WHERE EXPIRE = '1' ) WHERE TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%' OR ADDR LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%' )
COMPENSATE like '%' || '숙소' || '%'
OR COMPENSATE like '%' || '식사' || '%'
OR COMPENSATE like '%' || '급여' || '%'
ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT * FROM WORKBOARD WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY NUM DESC ) A ) WHERE R >= #{start} AND R <= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORKBOARD WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT SEX FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
